item.title: Things To Know About Docker
item.description: Runs natively on Linux and Windows Server Not the same as using Virtual Machines Key benefits to web developers: Accelerate developer onboarding Simplify working with multiple apps Consistency between envs. ship faster Quick Start Clone a repo docker run --name repo alpine/git clone https://github.com/docker/getting-started.git Build the image: cd getting-started docker build -t docker101tutorial . Run the container docker run -d -p 80:80 --name docker -tutorial docker101tutorial Save and push the image
